text: Now after [strongs id="h310" /] the death [strongs id="h4194" /] of Joshua [strongs id="h3091" /] it came to pass, that the children [strongs id="h1121" /] of Israel [strongs id="h3478" /] asked [strongs id="h7592" tvm="8799" /] the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /], saying [strongs id="h559" tvm="8800" /], Who shall go up [strongs id="h5927" tvm="8799" /] for us against the Canaanites [strongs id="h3669" /] first [strongs id="h8462" /], to fight [strongs id="h3898" tvm="8736" /] against them?

And the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] said [strongs id="h559" tvm="8799" /], Judah [strongs id="h3063" /] shall go up [strongs id="h5927" tvm="8799" /]: behold, I have delivered [strongs id="h5414" tvm="8804" /] the land [strongs id="h776" /] into his hand [strongs id="h3027" /].

And Judah [strongs id="h3063" /] said [strongs id="h559" tvm="8799" /] unto Simeon [strongs id="h8095" /] his brother [strongs id="h251" /], Come up [strongs id="h5927" tvm="8798" /] with me into my lot [strongs id="h1486" /], that we may fight [strongs id="h3898" tvm="8735" /] against the Canaanites [strongs id="h3669" /]; and I likewise will go [strongs id="h1980" tvm="8804" /] with thee into thy lot [strongs id="h1486" /]. So Simeon [strongs id="h8095" /] went [strongs id="h3212" tvm="8799" /] with him.

And Judah [strongs id="h3063" /] went up [strongs id="h5927" tvm="8799" /]; and the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] delivered [strongs id="h5414" tvm="8799" /] the Canaanites [strongs id="h3669" /] and the Perizzites [strongs id="h6522" /] into their hand [strongs id="h3027" /]: and they slew [strongs id="h5221" tvm="8686" /] of them in Bezek [strongs id="h966" /] ten [strongs id="h6235" /] thousand [strongs id="h505" /] men [strongs id="h376" /].

And they found [strongs id="h4672" tvm="8799" /] Adonibezek [strongs id="h137" /] in Bezek [strongs id="h966" /]: and they fought [strongs id="h3898" tvm="8735" /] against him, and they slew [strongs id="h5221" tvm="8686" /] the Canaanites [strongs id="h3669" /] and the Perizzites [strongs id="h6522" /].

But Adonibezek [strongs id="h137" /] fled [strongs id="h5127" tvm="8799" /]; and they pursued [strongs id="h7291" tvm="8799" /] after [strongs id="h310" /] him, and caught [strongs id="h270" tvm="8799" /] him, and cut off [strongs id="h7112" tvm="8762" /] his thumbs [strongs id="h931" /] [strongs id="h3027" /] and his great toes [strongs id="h7272" /].

And Adonibezek [strongs id="h137" /] said [strongs id="h559" tvm="8799" /], Threescore and ten [strongs id="h7657" /] kings [strongs id="h4428" /], having their thumbs [strongs id="h931" /] [strongs id="h3027" /] and their great toes [strongs id="h7272" /] cut off [strongs id="h7112" tvm="8794" /], gathered [strongs id="h3950" tvm="8764" /] [their meat] under my table [strongs id="h7979" /]: as I have done [strongs id="h6213" tvm="8804" /], so God [strongs id="h430" /] hath requited [strongs id="h7999" tvm="8765" /] me. And they brought [strongs id="h935" tvm="8686" /] him to Jerusalem [strongs id="h3389" /], and there he died [strongs id="h4191" tvm="8799" /].

Now the children [strongs id="h1121" /] of Judah [strongs id="h3063" /] had fought [strongs id="h3898" tvm="8735" /] against Jerusalem [strongs id="h3389" /], and had taken [strongs id="h3920" tvm="8799" /] it, and smitten [strongs id="h5221" tvm="8686" /] it with the edge [strongs id="h6310" /] of the sword [strongs id="h2719" /], and set [strongs id="h7971" tvm="8765" /] the city [strongs id="h5892" /] on fire [strongs id="h784" /].

And afterward [strongs id="h310" /] the children [strongs id="h1121" /] of Judah [strongs id="h3063" /] went down [strongs id="h3381" tvm="8804" /] to fight [strongs id="h3898" tvm="8736" /] against the Canaanites [strongs id="h3669" /], that dwelt [strongs id="h3427" tvm="8802" /] in the mountain [strongs id="h2022" /], and in the south [strongs id="h5045" /], and in the valley [strongs id="h8219" /].

And Judah [strongs id="h3063" /] went [strongs id="h3212" tvm="8799" /] against the Canaanites [strongs id="h3669" /] that dwelt [strongs id="h3427" tvm="8802" /] in Hebron [strongs id="h2275" /]: (now the name [strongs id="h8034" /] of Hebron [strongs id="h2275" /] before [strongs id="h6440" /] [was] Kirjatharba [strongs id="h7153" /]:) and they slew [strongs id="h5221" tvm="8686" /] Sheshai [strongs id="h8344" /], and Ahiman [strongs id="h289" /], and Talmai [strongs id="h8526" /].

And from thence he went [strongs id="h3212" tvm="8799" /] against the inhabitants [strongs id="h3427" tvm="8802" /] of Debir [strongs id="h1688" /]: and the name [strongs id="h8034" /] of Debir [strongs id="h1688" /] before [strongs id="h6440" /] [was] Kirjathsepher [strongs id="h7158" /]:

And Caleb [strongs id="h3612" /] said [strongs id="h559" tvm="8799" /], He that smiteth [strongs id="h5221" tvm="8686" /] Kirjathsepher [strongs id="h7158" /], and taketh [strongs id="h3920" tvm="8804" /] it, to him will I give [strongs id="h5414" tvm="8804" /] Achsah [strongs id="h5915" /] my daughter [strongs id="h1323" /] to wife [strongs id="h802" /].

And Othniel [strongs id="h6274" /] the son [strongs id="h1121" /] of Kenaz [strongs id="h7073" /], Caleb’s [strongs id="h3612" /] younger [strongs id="h6996" /] brother [strongs id="h251" /], took [strongs id="h3920" tvm="8799" /] it: and he gave [strongs id="h5414" tvm="8799" /] him Achsah [strongs id="h5915" /] his daughter [strongs id="h1323" /] to wife [strongs id="h802" /].

And it came to pass, when she came [strongs id="h935" tvm="8800" /] [to him], that she moved [strongs id="h5496" tvm="8686" /] him to ask [strongs id="h7592" tvm="8800" /] of her father [strongs id="h1" /] a field [strongs id="h7704" /]: and she lighted [strongs id="h6795" tvm="8799" /] from off [her] ass [strongs id="h2543" /]; and Caleb [strongs id="h3612" /] said [strongs id="h559" tvm="8799" /] unto her, What wilt thou?

And she said [strongs id="h559" tvm="8799" /] unto him, Give [strongs id="h3051" tvm="8798" /] me a blessing [strongs id="h1293" /]: for thou hast given [strongs id="h5414" tvm="8804" /] me a south [strongs id="h5045" /] land [strongs id="h776" /]; give [strongs id="h5414" tvm="8804" /] me also springs [strongs id="h1543" /] of water [strongs id="h4325" /]. And Caleb [strongs id="h3612" /] gave [strongs id="h5414" tvm="8799" /] her the upper [strongs id="h5942" /] springs [strongs id="h1543" /] and the nether [strongs id="h8482" /] springs [strongs id="h1543" /].

And the children [strongs id="h1121" /] of the Kenite [strongs id="h7017" /], Moses [strongs id="h4872" /]’ father in law [strongs id="h2859" tvm="8802" /], went up [strongs id="h5927" tvm="8804" /] out of the city [strongs id="h5892" /] of palm trees [strongs id="h8558" tvm="8677" /] [strongs id="h5899" /] with the children [strongs id="h1121" /] of Judah [strongs id="h3063" /] into the wilderness [strongs id="h4057" /] of Judah [strongs id="h3063" /], which [lieth] in the south [strongs id="h5045" /] of Arad [strongs id="h6166" /]; and they went [strongs id="h3212" tvm="8799" /] and dwelt [strongs id="h3427" tvm="8799" /] among [strongs id="h854" /] the people [strongs id="h5971" /].

And Judah [strongs id="h3063" /] went [strongs id="h3212" tvm="8799" /] with Simeon [strongs id="h8095" /] his brother [strongs id="h251" /], and they slew [strongs id="h5221" tvm="8686" /] the Canaanites [strongs id="h3669" /] that inhabited [strongs id="h3427" tvm="8802" /] Zephath [strongs id="h6857" /], and utterly destroyed [strongs id="h2763" tvm="8686" /] it. And the name [strongs id="h8034" /] of the city [strongs id="h5892" /] was called [strongs id="h7121" tvm="8799" /] Hormah [strongs id="h2767" /].

Also Judah [strongs id="h3063" /] took [strongs id="h3920" tvm="8799" /] Gaza [strongs id="h5804" /] with the coast [strongs id="h1366" /] thereof, and Askelon [strongs id="h831" /] with the coast [strongs id="h1366" /] thereof, and Ekron [strongs id="h6138" /] with the coast [strongs id="h1366" /] thereof.

And the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] was with Judah [strongs id="h3063" /]; and he drave out [strongs id="h3423" tvm="8686" /] [the inhabitants of] the mountain [strongs id="h2022" /]; but could not [strongs id="h3808" /] drive out [strongs id="h3423" tvm="8687" /] the inhabitants [strongs id="h3427" tvm="8802" /] of the valley [strongs id="h6010" /], because they had chariots [strongs id="h7393" /] of iron [strongs id="h1270" /].

And they gave [strongs id="h5414" tvm="8799" /] Hebron [strongs id="h2275" /] unto Caleb [strongs id="h3612" /], as Moses [strongs id="h4872" /] said [strongs id="h1696" tvm="8765" /]: and he expelled [strongs id="h3423" tvm="8686" /] thence the three [strongs id="h7969" /] sons [strongs id="h1121" /] of Anak [strongs id="h6061" /].

And the children [strongs id="h1121" /] of Benjamin [strongs id="h1144" /] did not drive out [strongs id="h3423" tvm="8689" /] the Jebusites [strongs id="h2983" /] that inhabited [strongs id="h3427" tvm="8802" /] Jerusalem [strongs id="h3389" /]; but the Jebusites [strongs id="h2983" /] dwell [strongs id="h3427" tvm="8799" /] with the children [strongs id="h1121" /] of Benjamin [strongs id="h1144" /] in Jerusalem [strongs id="h3389" /] unto this day [strongs id="h3117" /].

And the house [strongs id="h1004" /] of Joseph [strongs id="h3130" /], they also went up [strongs id="h5927" tvm="8799" /] against Bethel [strongs id="h1008" /]: and the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] [was] with them.

And the house [strongs id="h1004" /] of Joseph [strongs id="h3130" /] sent to descry [strongs id="h8446" tvm="8686" /] Bethel [strongs id="h1008" /]. (Now the name [strongs id="h8034" /] of the city [strongs id="h5892" /] before [strongs id="h6440" /] [was] Luz [strongs id="h3870" /].)

And the spies [strongs id="h8104" tvm="8802" /] saw [strongs id="h7200" tvm="8799" /] a man [strongs id="h376" /] come forth [strongs id="h3318" tvm="8802" /] out of the city [strongs id="h5892" /], and they said [strongs id="h559" tvm="8799" /] unto him, Shew [strongs id="h7200" tvm="8685" /] us, we pray thee, the entrance [strongs id="h3996" /] into the city [strongs id="h5892" /], and we will shew [strongs id="h6213" tvm="8804" /] thee mercy [strongs id="h2617" /].

And when he shewed [strongs id="h7200" tvm="8686" /] them the entrance [strongs id="h3996" /] into the city [strongs id="h5892" /], they smote [strongs id="h5221" tvm="8686" /] the city [strongs id="h5892" /] with the edge [strongs id="h6310" /] of the sword [strongs id="h2719" /]; but they let go [strongs id="h7971" tvm="8765" /] the man [strongs id="h376" /] and all his family [strongs id="h4940" /].

And the man [strongs id="h376" /] went [strongs id="h3212" tvm="8799" /] into the land [strongs id="h776" /] of the Hittites [strongs id="h2850" /], and built [strongs id="h1129" tvm="8799" /] a city [strongs id="h5892" /], and called [strongs id="h7121" tvm="8799" /] the name [strongs id="h8034" /] thereof Luz [strongs id="h3870" /]: which [is] the name [strongs id="h8034" /] thereof unto this day [strongs id="h3117" /].

Neither did Manasseh [strongs id="h4519" /] drive out [strongs id="h3423" tvm="8689" /] [the inhabitants of] Bethshean [strongs id="h1052" /] and her towns [strongs id="h1323" /], nor Taanach [strongs id="h8590" /] and her towns [strongs id="h1323" /], nor the inhabitants [strongs id="h3427" tvm="8802" /] of Dor [strongs id="h1756" /] and her towns [strongs id="h1323" /], nor the inhabitants [strongs id="h3427" tvm="8802" /] of Ibleam [strongs id="h2991" /] and her towns [strongs id="h1323" /], nor the inhabitants [strongs id="h3427" tvm="8802" /] of Megiddo [strongs id="h4023" /] and her towns [strongs id="h1323" /]: but the Canaanites [strongs id="h3669" /] would [strongs id="h2974" tvm="8686" /] dwell [strongs id="h3427" tvm="8800" /] in that land [strongs id="h776" /].

And it came to pass, when Israel [strongs id="h3478" /] was strong [strongs id="h2388" tvm="8804" /], that they put [strongs id="h7760" tvm="8799" /] the Canaanites [strongs id="h3669" /] to tribute [strongs id="h4522" /], and did not utterly [strongs id="h3423" tvm="8687" /] drive them out [strongs id="h3423" tvm="8689" /].

Neither did Ephraim [strongs id="h669" /] drive out [strongs id="h3423" tvm="8689" /] the Canaanites [strongs id="h3669" /] that dwelt [strongs id="h3427" tvm="8802" /] in Gezer [strongs id="h1507" /]; but the Canaanites [strongs id="h3669" /] dwelt [strongs id="h3427" tvm="8799" /] in Gezer [strongs id="h1507" /] among [strongs id="h7130" /] them.

Neither did Zebulun [strongs id="h2074" /] drive out [strongs id="h3423" tvm="8689" /] the inhabitants [strongs id="h3427" tvm="8802" /] of Kitron [strongs id="h7003" /], nor the inhabitants [strongs id="h3427" tvm="8802" /] of Nahalol [strongs id="h5096" /]; but the Canaanites [strongs id="h3669" /] dwelt [strongs id="h3427" tvm="8799" /] among [strongs id="h7130" /] them, and became tributaries [strongs id="h4522" /].

Neither did Asher [strongs id="h836" /] drive out [strongs id="h3423" tvm="8689" /] the inhabitants [strongs id="h3427" tvm="8802" /] of Accho [strongs id="h5910" /], nor the inhabitants [strongs id="h3427" tvm="8802" /] of Zidon [strongs id="h6721" /], nor of Ahlab [strongs id="h303" /], nor of Achzib [strongs id="h392" /], nor of Helbah [strongs id="h2462" /], nor of Aphik [strongs id="h663" /], nor of Rehob [strongs id="h7340" /]:

But the Asherites [strongs id="h843" /] dwelt [strongs id="h3427" tvm="8799" /] among [strongs id="h7130" /] the Canaanites [strongs id="h3669" /], the inhabitants [strongs id="h3427" tvm="8802" /] of the land [strongs id="h776" /]: for they did not drive them out [strongs id="h3423" tvm="8689" /].

Neither did Naphtali [strongs id="h5321" /] drive out [strongs id="h3423" tvm="8689" /] the inhabitants [strongs id="h3427" tvm="8802" /] of Bethshemesh [strongs id="h1053" /], nor the inhabitants [strongs id="h3427" tvm="8802" /] of Bethanath [strongs id="h1043" /]; but he dwelt [strongs id="h3427" tvm="8799" /] among [strongs id="h7130" /] the Canaanites [strongs id="h3669" /], the inhabitants [strongs id="h3427" tvm="8802" /] of the land [strongs id="h776" /]: nevertheless the inhabitants [strongs id="h3427" tvm="8802" /] of Bethshemesh [strongs id="h1053" /] and of Bethanath [strongs id="h1043" /] became tributaries [strongs id="h4522" /] unto them.

And the Amorites [strongs id="h567" /] forced [strongs id="h3905" tvm="8799" /] the children [strongs id="h1121" /] of Dan [strongs id="h1835" /] into the mountain [strongs id="h2022" /]: for they would not suffer [strongs id="h5414" tvm="8804" /] them to come down [strongs id="h3381" tvm="8800" /] to the valley [strongs id="h6010" /]:

But the Amorites [strongs id="h567" /] would [strongs id="h2974" tvm="8686" /] dwell [strongs id="h3427" tvm="8800" /] in mount [strongs id="h2022" /] Heres [strongs id="h2776" /] in Aijalon [strongs id="h357" /], and in Shaalbim [strongs id="h8169" /]: yet the hand [strongs id="h3027" /] of the house [strongs id="h1004" /] of Joseph [strongs id="h3130" /] prevailed [strongs id="h3513" tvm="8799" /], so that they became tributaries [strongs id="h4522" /].

And the coast [strongs id="h1366" /] of the Amorites [strongs id="h567" /] [was] from the going up [strongs id="h4608" /] to Akrabbim [strongs id="h4610" /], from the rock [strongs id="h5553" /], and upward [strongs id="h4605" /].

And an angel [strongs id="h4397" /] of the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] came up [strongs id="h5927" tvm="8799" /] from Gilgal [strongs id="h1537" /] to Bochim [strongs id="h1066" /], and said [strongs id="h559" tvm="8799" /], I made you to go up [strongs id="h5927" tvm="8686" /] out of Egypt [strongs id="h4714" /], and have brought [strongs id="h935" tvm="8686" /] you unto the land [strongs id="h776" /] which I sware [strongs id="h7650" tvm="8738" /] unto your fathers [strongs id="h1" /]; and I said [strongs id="h559" tvm="8799" /], I will never [strongs id="h5769" /] break [strongs id="h6565" tvm="8686" /] my covenant [strongs id="h1285" /] with you.

And ye shall make [strongs id="h3772" tvm="8799" /] no league [strongs id="h1285" /] with the inhabitants [strongs id="h3427" tvm="8802" /] of this land [strongs id="h776" /]; ye shall throw down [strongs id="h5422" tvm="8799" /] their altars [strongs id="h4196" /]: but ye have not obeyed [strongs id="h8085" tvm="8804" /] my voice [strongs id="h6963" /]: why have ye done [strongs id="h6213" tvm="8804" /] this?

Wherefore I also said [strongs id="h559" tvm="8804" /], I will not drive them out [strongs id="h1644" tvm="8762" /] from before [strongs id="h6440" /] you; but they shall be [as thorns] in your sides [strongs id="h6654" /], and their gods [strongs id="h430" /] shall be a snare [strongs id="h4170" /] unto you.

And it came to pass, when the angel [strongs id="h4397" /] of the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /] spake [strongs id="h1696" tvm="8763" /] these words [strongs id="h1697" /] unto all the children [strongs id="h1121" /] of Israel [strongs id="h3478" /], that the people [strongs id="h5971" /] lifted up [strongs id="h5375" tvm="8799" /] their voice [strongs id="h6963" /], and wept [strongs id="h1058" tvm="8799" /].

And when Joshua [strongs id="h3091" /] had let the people [strongs id="h5971" /] go [strongs id="h7971" tvm="8762" /], the children [strongs id="h1121" /] of Israel [strongs id="h3478" /] went [strongs id="h3212" tvm="8799" /] every man [strongs id="h376" /] unto his inheritance [strongs id="h5159" /] to possess [strongs id="h3423" tvm="8800" /] the land [strongs id="h776" /].

And Joshua [strongs id="h3091" /] the son [strongs id="h1121" /] of Nun [strongs id="h5126" /], the servant [strongs id="h5650" /] of the LORD [strongs id="h3068" /], died [strongs id="h4191" tvm="8799" /], [being] an hundred [strongs id="h3967" /] and ten [strongs id="h6235" /] years [strongs id="h8141" /] old [strongs id="h1121" /].

And they buried [strongs id="h6912" tvm="8799" /] him in the border [strongs id="h1366" /] of his inheritance [strongs id="h5159" /] in Timnathheres [strongs id="h8556" /], in the mount [strongs id="h2022" /] of Ephraim [strongs id="h669" /], on the north side [strongs id="h6828" /] of the hill [strongs id="h2022" /] Gaash [strongs id="h1608" /].
